title.rendered: LG G6 Mobile Phone Expected to use Android 8.0 OREO in 2018

content.rendered:
It’s not the first smart phone to receive the update but being the second will help sales considering the LG G6’s low handset price.

The update was expected to arrive in June 2018, but LG’s Italian twitter account has stated the European update is planned at some point in the second quarter of 2018.

The LG G6 smart phone has a very good specification at a considerably lower cost than the leading smart phone brands.

LG G6 specs

Display size, resolution 5.7-inch, 2,880×1,440 pixels
Pixel density 565 ppi
Dimensions (inches) 5.86×2.83×0.31 inches
Dimensions (millimeters) 148.9×71.97.x7.9 mm
Weight (ounces, grams) 5.7 oz, 162g
Mobile software Android 7.0 Nougat
Camera 13-megapixel, 13-megapixel wide
Front-facing camera 5-megapixel
Video capture 4K
Processor 2.35GHz Snapdragon 821 with Adreno 530 GPU
Storage 32GB
RAM 4GB
Expandable storage Up to 2TB
Battery 3,300mAh (nonremovable)
Fingerprint sensor Back cover
Connector USB-C
Special features 18:9 screen ratio, wireless charging, IP68

LG’s new concepts and designs are starting to catch up with Apple iPhone and Samsung Galaxy. The LG G6 compares well to the Samsung Galaxy S8.
The design is simple, slick and as with all new smart phones boasts the water proof feature (test at your own leisure).

Check our Fonehouse’s LG G6 contract deals here
